name: Block Pooper 7: The Poop Protocol
description:
An unlicensed sequel to the widely-acclaimed Block Pooper series, BP7 takes a look into the near future of the Block Pooper world.

Set 30 years after BP6, the game follows the life of one of the last surviving poopers, driven by the memories of his fallen comrades.

Made over a day at IndieCabin 2018. I've only tested the OS X version.

Controls: IDK, used a controller. I think WASD/mouse works too.

Art / Programming: Corey Hoard
Music: Mat Solomon
Based on the Block Pooper series by Ziba Scott, Luigi Guatieri
